paper_title.ja: 亜鉛めっき皮膜上への架橋タンニン酸化成処理皮膜の作製と耐食性評価
paper_title.en: Preparation and Its Corrosion Resistance of Cross-linked Tannic Acid Coating on Zinc Plating

description.ja: Cross-linked tannic acid was prepared by simple operation using 1, 6-hexanediamine as a cross-linker. Then it was coated on zinc plating and its corrosion resistance was evaluated by a salt spray test. As a result, it was found that cross-linked tannic acid coating provides strong protection for zinc plating against white rust.
description.en: Cross-linked tannic acid was prepared by simple operation using 1, 6-hexanediamine as a cross-linker. Then it was coated on zinc plating and its corrosion resistance was evaluated by a salt spray test. As a result, it was found that cross-linked tannic acid coating provides strong protection for zinc plating against white rust.

paper_title.ja: 亜鉛板上のタンニン酸化成処理皮膜構造の赤外スペクトルおよび計算化学による研究
paper_title.en: Structure of Chemical Coating of Tannic Acid on Zinc Plate Studied by Infrared Spectroscopy and Computational Chemistry

description.ja: The structure of a coating film of tannic acid on a zinc plate was studied by infrared reflection absorption spectroscopy and quantum chemistry calculation. It was shown that the film consisted of chelate complexes of zinc(II) and tannic acid.
description.en: The structure of a coating film of tannic acid on a zinc plate was studied by infrared reflection absorption spectroscopy and quantum chemistry calculation. It was shown that the film consisted of chelate complexes of zinc(II) and tannic acid.

paper_title.ja: 天然多価フェノール化合物による亜鉛表面の改質と界面構造
Plastic Shape Material “Urushi-Nendo” Applying Lacquer Tree Paint
paper_title.en: Plastic shape material "Urushi-Nendo" applying lacquer tree paint

description.en: A new material for use in shaping has been created using urushi (Japanese lacquer) as a matrix, with natural fibers, such as cellulose as a filler and a primary amine as an additive, to promote the lacquer curing reaction. The cured material is characterized by exhibiting a strength comparable to that of wood.

publication_name.ja: Bulletin of the Chemical Society of Japan
publication_name.en: BULLETIN OF THE CHEMICAL SOCIETY OF JAPAN

paper_title.en: Plastic shape material "Urushi-Nendo" applying lacquer tree paint

description.en: A new material for use in shaping has been created using urushi (Japanese lacquer) as a matrix, with natural fibers, such as cellulose as a filler and a primary amine as an additive, to promote the lacquer curing reaction. The cured material is characterized by exhibiting a strength comparable to that of wood.

publication_name.en: BULLETIN OF THE CHEMICAL SOCIETY OF JAPAN

paper_title.ja: 漆の硬化反応に及ぼす温度―湿度の関係

paper_title.en: Chemical modification of lacquer tree paint using primary amines

description.en: An investigation was undertaken on a chemical modification of urushi paint using a small amount of primary amines as additives by taking advantage of their reactivity with urushiol, one of the main components of urushi liquid, at room temperature. The first modification method is related to an accelerated curing reaction of urushi paint, as a result of an enhanced formation of reversed micelles of urushiol. With this method, a large reduction in the curing time and curing at low humidity were achieved, and the light resistance of the cured film was also improved, as evaluated by an accelerated exposure test. The second modification method is based on the functionality of a compound linked to urushiol. Primary amine having a water-repellent property, was synthesized. added to urushi liquid. and then cured. The resulting film demonstrated a good water-repellent property. and maintained this property even against degradation under accelerated exposure. These primary amines as additives undergo neither bleeding nor elution from urushi film, because they combine with Urushiol. In addition, because these methods are based on a homogeneous mixing of additives and urushi liquid. they have advantages that neither large-scale plants nor equipment investment is required for their production.

publication_name.en: BULLETIN OF THE CHEMICAL SOCIETY OF JAPAN

description.en: An investigation was undertaken on a chemical modification of urushi paint using a small amount of primary amines as additives by taking advantage of their reactivity with urushiol, one of the main components of urushi liquid, at room temperature. The first modification method is related to an accelerated curing reaction of urushi paint, as a result of an enhanced formation of reversed micelles of urushiol. With this method, a large reduction in the curing time and curing at low humidity were achieved, and the light resistance of the cured film was also improved, as evaluated by an accelerated exposure test. The second modification method is based on the functionality of a compound linked to urushiol. Primary amine having a water-repellent property, was synthesized. added to urushi liquid. and then cured. The resulting film demonstrated a good water-repellent property. and maintained this property even against degradation under accelerated exposure. These primary amines as additives undergo neither bleeding nor elution from urushi film, because they combine with Urushiol. In addition, because these methods are based on a homogeneous mixing of additives and urushi liquid. they have advantages that neither large-scale plants nor equipment investment is required for their production.

paper_title.ja: 漆など天然材料の活用を探る－化学的アプローチと放射線の応用－
原子間力顕微鏡による漆塗膜の観察
paper_title.en: Observation of Lacquer Tree Paint Film by Atomic Force Microscope

description.ja: 漆の硬化条件のうち湿度を変えて硬化させた透けろいろ漆塗膜を作成して, 原子間力顕微鏡 (AFM) によって表面を観察した。前処理なしの試料とエッチング処理をしたものとを観察したところ, 塗膜表面に親水性成分の存在と, 起伏の大きさの違いが認められた。また高倍率での観察では, さらに微細な起伏の存在が初めて認められた。これらの起伏の形成は漆の硬化反応の過程をあらわすものであり, ウルシオールの逆ミセルによる粒子構造を考えることで説明できた。
description.en: Lacquer tree paint films (Urushi lacquer films) were prepared under various humidities in the hardening process. The films were observed with atomic force microscopy (AFM). In the comparison between etched and unetched films, from the AFM images of the films, the presence of hydrophilic components on the surface and the different size of undulation were observed. At a high magnification, much finer undulations were observed for the first time. The formation of these undulations represents the hardening mechanism of urushi : urushiol's particle structure made of reversed micelle is assumed to participate impotant role.

publisher.ja: 一般社団法人 色材協会

publication_name.en: Journal of the Japan Society of Colour Material

paper_title.ja: 漆塗膜の内部構造と光劣化反応
漆塗膜の光劣化と外観的評価
射出成形ＣＡＥの解析評価と信頼性向上への取り組み
流動解析シミュレーションの信頼性評価方法の検討
paper_title.en: Examination of Reliability Evaluation Method of the Flow Analysis Simulation

description.ja:
So the flow analysis simulation of injection molding is a thing to reproduce the flow behavior in real molding processing with a computer faithfully, but a problem that analysis result doesn't agree with a real molding may happen not a little. This cause is the influence that using an approximation and charges for the difficult measurement, managing an impossible thing over performance of computer, because treating polymer that analysis of behavior is difficult to understand.
Actually, when using simulation, the important thing is information of agreement and disagreement, so we need to compare with real moldings and simulation output, and tie it with fixed quantity. So we used dynamic-characteristic-analysis and statical-characteristic-analysis of quality engineering, and showed degree of effect of factor concerned, and reliability of simulation by comparison.
description.en:
So the flow analysis simulation of injection molding is a thing to reproduce the flow behavior in real molding processing with a computer faithfully, but a problem that analysis result doesn't agree with a real molding may happen not a little. This cause is the influence that using an approximation and charges for the difficult measurement, managing an impossible thing over performance of computer, because treating polymer that analysis of behavior is difficult to understand.
Actually, when using simulation, the important thing is information of agreement and disagreement, so we need to compare with real moldings and simulation output, and tie it with fixed quantity. So we used dynamic-characteristic-analysis and statical-characteristic-analysis of quality engineering, and showed degree of effect of factor concerned, and reliability of simulation by comparison.

publisher.ja: The Japan Society of Polymer Processing
publisher.en: The Japan Society of Polymer Processing

paper_title.en: Observation of Oriental Lacquer Film by Electron Probe Microanalyzer

description.ja:
漆は古代から使われてきた天然塗料であり, その用途の代表である漆器はその独特の美しさと耐久性の良さから現在も使用されている。その我々に馴染みのある漆も塗膜構造や硬化反応機構は非常に複雑で, 化学的にまだまだ解明されていない部分も多い。
今回の実験では, 硬化漆塗膜を最新のEPMAで分析し, 蛍光X線分析装置, 窒素/タンパク分析装置の分析結果と併せて比較, 考察した。そして塗膜中に分散するゴム質の粒子とその周辺部で含有元素の分布を調べた結果, 硬化反応時に形成される2価の金属錯体の存在の推定や硬化反応に関係する酵素に含まれる銅, 窒素原子の非局在化の傾向を知ることができた。またゴム粒子の単相構造や塗膜構造の深さ方向の推察をすることができた。
description.en: In order to elucidate the chemical structure and the hardening mechanism of oriental lacquer films, we analyzed them with the latest electron probe microanalyzer along with X-ray fluorescence and nitrogen-protein analyzer. From the results of elemental distribution in a gum particle and its periphery that had been dispersed in the oriental lacquer film, we were able to know the presence to divalent metal complex and the delocalization of copper and nitrogen from a hardening enzyme in the hardening reaction. We were also able to know the single-component structure of gum particle and the depth profile of oriental lacquer films.
